title: SEO
tagsAndSkills: PPC,On-page optimization,Google Webmaster tools,SEM,Content writing,SEO,Digital marketing,Off-page optimization
jobDescription:
Manage the search engine optimization responsibilities of company websites and clients websites. Bring in experts in SEO solutions to projects to make sure that both big milestones and small tasks are done well so that clients campaign KPIs and business goals are met.


Day to day, your responsibilities will include
  • Website tech audit and analysis
  • Rank keywords and increase organic traffic of websites.
  • Ability to identify SEO problems or inhibiting factors, diagnose the root cause and devise effective intervention.
  • On-page Optimization and Off-page optimization.
  • All Associated steps, including website structure, Technical SEO, keyword analysis, Meta tags, titles, submissions, traffic analysis and rank optimization etc.
  • Coordination with other teams and clients for other SEO implementations.
  • Deep understanding of building organic traffic and improving SERPs.
  • Work closely with Content Writing and Content marketing teams. Content skill is a plus.
  • In-depth knowledge of current SEO tools and practices.
  • In-depth knowledge of Google Algorithm
  • Need to generate data on a daily basis and show progress.
  • Identifying and implementing strategies for increasing website traffic through organic search listings without being blacklisted.
  • Research and identify URL architecture, page errors, content and navigational issues, and other factors that impact the technical performance of a website.
  • Work heavily with SEO tools, especially Google Webmaster Tools, Bing Webmaster Tools, MOZ and Deep Crawl, SEMRush etc.
  • Work on the ON page levels to improve keyword performance and revenue for client websites.


Qualification We re looking for an SEO specialist with outstanding experience that includes:
  • Contribution to ensuring client satisfaction with delivered projects demonstration of technical excellence in SEO and digital marketing on projects and for building function
  • Take Ownership in learning about the client s business, industry, customers, and competition
  • Ability to deliver error-free and high-quality output on projects
  • Guide the team of analysts to follow the SEO framework, processes,and templates and contribute to evolving them
  • Introduce best practices in digital marketing, SEO, SEM, and PPC to the team based on your knowledge and expertise.

title: Assistant Account Manager
tagsAndSkills: Administration,Report generation,Data analysis,Sales,Networking,Relationship building,Proposal preparation,Sales process
jobDescription:
Caliber Hunt is looking for Assistant Account Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey"
  • Client Communication:Assisting in communication with clients to understand their needs and address any concerns
  • Providing updates on account status and delivering information about products or services
  • Account Planning:Collaborating with Account Managers to develop strategic account plans
  • Analyzing client data and market trends to identify growth opportunities
  • Sales Support:Assisting in the sales process by preparing proposals, presentations, and contracts
  • Coordinating with the sales team to ensure the timely delivery of products or services
  • Problem Resolution:Addressing client issues and working to resolve problems in a timely and effective manner
  • Escalating issues to Account Managers or other relevant parties when necessary
  • Data Analysis:Analyzing client data and market trends to identify opportunities for account growth
  • Generating reports and presentations for internal and external use
  • Relationship Building:Building and maintaining positive relationships with clients
  • Networking and attending client meetings alongside Account Managers
  • Administrative Tasks:Handling administrative tasks such as preparing reports, maintaining client files, and updating databases
  • Coordinating with other departments to ensure smooth account operations

title: Assistant Manager - Digital
tagsAndSkills: Content management,Display advertising,digital content,Campaign management,Social media,Marketing campaigns,digital strategy,SEO
jobDescription:
Chalo is looking for Assistant Manager - Digital to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey"
  • Digital Strategy Development:Collaborate with the marketing team to develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with business goals
  • Stay informed about industry trends and emerging digital platforms to ensure the company remains at the forefront of digital marketing innovation
  • Campaign Management:Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email, search engines, and display advertising
  • Monitor campaign performance, analyze key metrics, and provide insights to enhance future campaigns
  • Content Management:Oversee the creation and optimization of digital content for various online channels
  • Ensure content is aligned with the brand voice, messaging, and SEO best practices
  • Social Media Management:Manage and grow the company's social media presence
  • Develop and implement social media campaigns to drive engagement and increase followers
  • Analytics and Reporting:Utilize analytics tools to track and measure the performance of digital marketing campaigns
  • Provide regular reports with key performance indicators and actionable insights to improve results
  • Budget Management:Work with the marketing team to develop and manage digital marketing budgets
  • Ensure cost-effective use of resources while maximizing campaign impact
  • Collaboration and Communication:Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and IT, to align digital strategies with overall business objectives
  • Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders and external partners
  • Stay Updated on Industry Trends:Stay informed about the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and technologies
  • Make recommendations for adopting new strategies to improve the company's digital presence

title: Deputy Manager - Proposals & Tenders
tagsAndSkills: GIS,Substation,Electrical design,Transmission line,Circuit breakers,AutoCAD,EPC,Microstation
jobDescription:
• Study the technical part of Tender Document and understand the technical specifications/ customer requirements.
  • Knowledge in assessing the pre-qualification requirements and supporting the tendering team for Bid/No Bid decision.
  • Review preparation of pre-engineering estimates at the time of tendering (Rough Cut BOQ). Prepare BOQs for Tender Cost Estimation purpose.
  • Attending Techno-commercial discussions with customers and vendors as required.
  • Full understanding of Single line diagrams Equipment arrangement layouts. Reviewing the proposals towards optimized and customized solutions for various substation tenders (AIS, GIS, Hybrid). Innovative ideas to prepare a cost-effective solution.
  • Technical data sheets verification of primary equipment. Knowledge of primary equipment, such as circuit breakers, disconnectors, earthing switches, instrument transformers, power transformers, etc. with minimal support from the Engineering team.
  • Collaborate with SCM having good understanding about strategic sourcing and do Vendor Offer evaluations. Finalize the tender sourcing plan appropriately.
  • Knowledge of Engineering Aspects of EHV SS S / Transmission Line Projects will be an added advantage.
  • Analyse risk probability severity of the tenders from technical, commercial, contractual perspectives drive the mitigation strategy liaising with the different disciplines. Should play a vital role in presenting the risk review process and getting the approval from management based on the tender volume the risks involved.
  • Error free and timely submission of Electrical Design and Engineering, Quantity Estimation, BOQ, Engineering calculations for Tender/ Bid preparation for EHV Substation.
  • Update knowledge of checking of drawing, modelling and application of software like AUTOCAD/ MICROSTATION, ETAP, EDSA, etc
  • Use creativity wherever appropriate to provide best solutions for the given situation within the framework of tender. Continuously develop standard templates and collate databases for tendering.
  • Perform lost proposal analysis, identify potential cause, and recommend future actions in cooperation with corresponding supplying unit(s) to obtain better future results.
  • Able to fill in the cost for tendering BOQ and cost data replacing many spreadsheets to ensure proper tender validation for each work package.

Desired Candidate Profile

Experience: Min 8-10 Yrs Experience in detail Electrical Engineering from an EPC Background, catering up to 400kV/ 765kV AIS GIS Substation. TL knowledge will be an added benefit.

Your background

  • A bachelor s degree in electrical engineering or related discipline.
  • Minimum 7-10 years of experience in substation tendering and project engineering activities (technical commercial).
  • Experience and skill to prepare and support the bid process.
  • Good Understanding of sales process, sales tools techniques, Market Business Intelligence, sales drive.
